Class MagicSquare

java.lang.Object
MagicSquare
public class MagicSquare extends Object
This class represents a Magic Square, an n*n matrix square which the numbers in each row, column, and diagonal add up to the same number
Version:
(09/01/2023)
Author:
(Raz Yehiel)

    • isMagicSquare

      public static boolean isMagicSquare(int[][] mat)
      Check if a given matrix represents a magic sqaure, a Magic Square is an n*n matrix square which the numbers in each row, column, and diagonal add up to the same number
      Returns:
      true if the given matrix represents a magic sqaure, false if not.
